_header: The feast of Whitsunday swithe good is to hold
_description: The Feast of Pentecost, in one MS of the South English Legendary

BLEge2810.First Lines: Þe feste of whitsoneday swiþe gode is to holdeOf al cristenmen wo so wit wolde…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …leue us ur cristendom an erþe her so witeþat in þe boc of liue ur names mote be write
